issue.title: [CF 69] Error on logging in, also don't see addon settings
issue.body:
Just installed TellMeWhen addon from curse, version 2.2.3. Got this message on logging in

Message: Interface\FrameXML\UIParent.lua:2717: bad argument #1 to 'pairs' (table expected, got nil)
Time: 12/28/10 02:22:28
Count: 1
Stack: [C]: in function `pairs'
Interface\FrameXML\UIParent.lua:2717: in function `CopyTable'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:603: in function `TellMeWhen_BuildDSNTables'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen_options.lua:158: in function `TellMeWhen_Options_Compile'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:324: in function `TellMeWhen_VarsLoaded'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:632: in function <Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:630>

Locals: (*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = "table expected, got nil"
= <function> defined =[C]:-1

also can't see addon settings page in interface panel, even with all other addons disabled. Besides this works just fine, but 4 buttons aren't enough for warlock.

see saved variables file attached.

PS. By the way, addon is great, many thanks for your work on it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Miauly | Imported from CurseForge issue #69 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua

<p>saved variables file</p>


> Posted by CurseForge user Miauly

I love you. Your saved variables file was the missing link to a problem that many people were having. If only more people would submit their errors here...


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Let me know if 2.2.3a fixes this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

It not showing up in the interface menu is a bug that i am aware of, here is one way to work around it (hopefully it will work): Type the following:

/run TellMeWhen_Settings.DSN = {} ReloadUI()

(Note that this will reload your UI, so don't do it in the middle of a bossfight or something)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
